message: I believe you can only get push notifications for waiting voice messages.
Thanks already Deleted had no friends on it just not what I was looking for
No prob. I currently use HeyTell instead. Talkbox has a much nicer UI, but it's iOS only so I can't use it to talk to my friends on Android.
yea voxer like they claim they have a large userbase, but none of my friends are on it
I am not ready to give up my skype just too good of a product
Whats even worse you can't delete past conversations. No way to delete. Tec Support was not so helpful anyway Text Free is the only good thing I have as far as that goes. Or Skype
